duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan and oversee the development of voice/collaboration platforms and enterprise voice and video architecture.
Develop the strategic IT plan to enable voice and video services delivery and define the investment roadmap for future voice services.
Manage the design and approach to access, security, continuity, and maintenance of all voice and video services.
Participate in disaster recovery infrastructure planning, building, and testing, and define continuous improvement plans for system availability and performance.
Collaborate with IT leaders on strategic network services initiatives, participate in discussions with vendors, and serve as a technical mentor for staff.
Communicate architecture decisions, roadblocks, and timelines to stakeholders, and comply with all policies and standards.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a quantitative or business field (e.g., statistics, mathematics, engineering, computer science)
